## [Government Tender Announcement](#government-tender-announcement)
### Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is issuing a tender for the supply of mowers. The contract entails the delivery of one Group 1 – Front Mower and one Group 2 – Wide Area Mower to the RCMP.

#### Tender Summary
* **Reference Number**: cb-573-2858865
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: 202405130 A & B
* **Notification Date**: 2024-05-01
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-27
* **Effective Tender Date**: 2024-07-30

#### Tender Details
* **Contracting Authority**: RCMP
* **Contact Information**:
  * Name: Andrew Johnson
  * Email: andrew.johnson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
  * Phone: 587-338-6198

#### Supplier Requirements
To be eligible to submit a bid, suppliers must possess a valid Supply Arrangement under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-18MOWR/B. 

#### Notice and Debrie
This notice is hereby published on Buyandsell.gc.ca for a period of 15 days according to the supply arrangement.

#### Delivery Date
The delivery date for the requested goods and services is 2024-07-30.

#### Debriefing
Bidders can request a debriefing on the results of the tender if their bid is unsuccessful. The debriefing will be made available in writing, by telephone, or in person, up to 15 working days from the notification of the unsuccessful bid.

### Attachements

No attachments are available at this time.

* **UNSpsc**:  21101701
* **Description**: Mower
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
